tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE transaction_dataset (
    transaction_id INTEGER,
    item_id INTEGER,
    quantity INTEGER,
    PRIMARY KEY (transaction_id, item_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES lift_support_metrics(item_id)
);

CREATE TABLE association_rules (
    rule_id INTEGER,
    antecedent_id INTEGER,
    consequent_id INTEGER,
    confidence FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY (rule_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (antecedent_id) REFERENCES lift_support_metrics(item_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (consequent_id) REFERENCES lift_support_metrics(item_id)
);

CREATE TABLE item_relationships (
    relationship_id INTEGER,
    item1_id INTEGER,
    item2_id INTEGER,
    support_metric FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY (relationship_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (item1_id) REFERENCES lift_support_metrics(item_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (item2_id) REFERENCES lift_support_metrics(item_id)
);

CREATE TABLE lift_support_metrics (
  item_id INT,
  support FLOAT,
  lift FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE transactions (
  transaction_id INT,
  item_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE association_rules (
  antecedent_item_id INT,
  consequent_item_id INT,
  support FLOAT,
  confidence FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE items (
  item_id INT,
  item_name VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE transactions_data (
  transaction_id INT,
  items_list VARCHAR
)
